reference_audios.name: th_zero_shot
reference_audios.text: 希望你以后能够做的比我还好呦。

reference_audios.name: th_cross_lingual
reference_audios.text: 在那之后完全收购那家公司

reference_audios.name: en_2
reference_audios.text: I think people online have actually assembled videos showing every launch and it just gets like crazy fast as you get to twenty twenty three. So yeah, so we've done a nineteen three flight. We're now qualifying Falcon nine to be able to do forty flights.

reference_audios.name: en_3
reference_audios.text: I'm so happy I got to do this. I really wanted to work with Tom Hooper. I know that he records live and he films and records your vocals live. It's such an interesting thing to me and I wanted to see him work. I had actually done screen tests for Les Mis.

reference_audios.name: th_9804
reference_audios.text: มันทำหน้าที่ร่วมกับเนื้อเยื่อเกี่ยวพันธ์ ในการช่วยยึดตัวของเราไว้

reference_audios.name: th_8620
reference_audios.text: ที่บรรยายไว้เพียงว่าเป็นนกที่กระหายเลือด
